pda.control

Class LaunchCtrl

  • java.lang.Object
    • pda.control.LaunchCtrl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener, IApplication

    public class LaunchCtrl
extends java.lang.Object
implements IApplication, java.awt.event.ActionListener
    The "LaunchCtrl" application that starts all others. The LaunchCtrl does NOT start itself (ONLY the OTHERS applications). The LaunchCtrl is created only by the PDACtrl.
    Version:
    $Revision: 29 $
    Author:
    F. Merciol, D. Deveaux MAJ J-F. Kamp <{francois.merciol|daniel.deveaux}@univ-ubs.fr>
